## type DockerComposeFile



```go
type DockerComposeFile struct {
    WorkspaceName string
    WorkspaceDir  string
    FileName      string
    FilePath      string
    Instances     map[string]instance // Container instance declarations
    // contains filtered or unexported fields
}
```
